title: Every Matrix is a Product of Toeplitz Matrices

tldr.text: It is shown that every n×n matrix is generically a product of Toeplitz or Hankel matrices, and such decompositions do not exist if the authors require the factors to be symmetric Toe Plitz or persymmetric Hankel, even if they allow an infinite number of factors.
